text: Sufian Abdel Rahman Othman Tayeh simply known as Sufian Tayeh (Arabic: سفيان تايه) (20 August, 1971 - 2 December, 2023) was a Palestinian physics professor and lecturer. He also served as the President of the Islamic University of Gaza from August 2023 until his death along with his family in December 2023 by an Israeli airstrike. ==References== ==Other websites== * Sufian Tayeh on Palestinian Information Centre. Category:1971 births Category:2023 deaths Category:People from the Gaza Strip Category:Civilians killed in the Israel–Hamas war Category:Deaths by Israeli airstrikes
title: Sufian Tayeh
